title: The World's First "Mailbag" Show
description:
Nobody had ever thought to have people send in questions that podcast hosts could answer on a recorded episode. But then we went and did it, because we're podcast innovators. Please send us thousands of dollars so we can consult for your business or whatever. 
The questions on this episode include, but are not limited to:
- Who takes over at Bama after Nick Saban?
- What team is most ready to explode into a dumpster fire? 
- What would you choose as the mascot if you were the AD of a new program?
- How are our skin care routines looking? 
- Which children's entertainment is the worst? 
- What is a blender's highest use? 
- Did people think Garth Brooks was sexy in the mid 90s?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Nobody had ever thought to have people send in questions that podcast hosts could answer on a recorded episode. But then we went and did it, because we're podcast innovators. Please send us thousands of dollars so we can consult for your business or whatever.  The questions on this episode include, but are not limited to: - Who takes over at Bama after Nick Saban? - What team is most ready to explode into a dumpster fire?  - What would you choose as the mascot if you were the AD of a new program? - How are our skin care routines looking?  - Which children's entertainment is the worst?  - What is a blender's highest use?  - Did people think Garth Brooks was sexy in the mid 90s?
